update j_distribution
classific_id = #{classificId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and upd_eac = ( #{updEac,jdbcType=BIGINT} -1)
